title: Can this laptop run league 60 fps low settings?

embed.description: Buy Lenovo Z50 15.6 Inch AMD FX7500 8GB 1TB Laptop - Black at Argos.co.uk, visit Argos.co.uk to shop online for Laptops and netbooks, Laptops and PCs, Technology

body: I don't care about graphic settings, as long as I get 60 fps, ty :)

replies.body: I can't really make any guarantees on any rig you select, but I do recommend using the[ recommended specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) guide to help make the best decision for you.  Take your time and and make sure to use the outline to help find what you're looking for.  Good luck!
